subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Following an impassioned speech by Coach Rex Ryan, the Jets’ rookie quarterback Mark Sanchez played like a veteran and the defense shut down one of the N.F.L.’s most potent offenses.
snippet: Following an impassioned speech by Coach Rex Ryan, the Jets’ rookie quarterback Mark Sanchez played like a veteran and the defense shut down one of the N.F.L.’s most potent offenses.
